Class WolfNSheep_Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.glen_h.games.wolfnsheep.WolfNSheep_Main

  • public class WolfNSheep_Main
extends Activity
    This is the main, single-player, wolf 'n sheep game activity.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

        void makeInvisible()
        Clear all visible buttons (wolf, grow, shear, and swap). Changes the visibility states of the action buttons to View.GONE.

      • roll

        Do the actual roll. Uses the random_number integer and performs moves based on that.
